data.name: DEFAULT_TOOLS_DESCRIPTION
data.value: The following tools are available for you. Use the links below to quickly access key functions you wish to perform.

data.value: Use links below to manage your product catalog.

data.value: Simple statistics data about your store

data.name: ATTRIBUTECLASSEDIT_ERROR_EMPTY_FRIENDLYNAME
data.value: 'Friendly Name' must not be left blank.

data.name: ATTRIBUTECLASSES_REMOVE_CONFIRMATION
data.value: This will remove all data associated with this class. Are you sure you want to delete?

data.name: ATTRIBUTECLASSES_DELETE_ERROR_PRODUCTS
data.value: You cannot delete this class since there are products associated with it.

data.name: ATTRIBUTECLASSES_DELETE_ERROR_CATEGORIES1
data.value: You cannot delete this class since there are categories associated with it.

data.name: ATTRIBUTECLASSES_DELETE_ERROR_CATEGORIES2
data.value: You cannot delete this class since it is the only one for categories.

data.name: ATTRIBUTECLASSES_DELETE_ERROR_SKUS
data.value: You cannot delete this class since there are SKUs associated with it.

data.name: ATTRIBUTEEDIT_REMOVE_CONFIRMATION
data.value: This will remove all data associated with this attribute. Are you sure you want to delete?

data.name: ATTRIBUTEEDIT_ERROR_FIELDNAMEDUPLICTAION
data.value: The field with such name already exists. Try to use another field name.

data.name: CAMPAIGN_TEST_WARNING
data.value: Make sure you test the campaign before sending it out to multiple customers.

data.name: CAMPAIGN_SELECT_ROLES
data.value: Select roles campaign will be sent to

data.name: CAMPAIGN_VARIABLES_FULLNAME_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Customer full name. For example Jon Doe.

data.name: CAMPAIGN_VARIABLES_USERNAME_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Will be replace by the customer user name.

data.name: CAMPAIGN_VARIABLES_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Use these variables in the message template.

data.name: CAMPAIGN_SEND_CONFIRM
data.value: Are you sure you want to send mass email? Make sure you send test email before that!

data.name: CATALOGIMPORT_CAUTION
data.value: Please proceed with caution when importing data using xml file. Xml format must be the same as the one generated by export function. It is prefered that you back up all store database before proceeding.

data.name: CATALOGIMPORT_IMPORTRESULT_FAILURE
data.value: There were errors during import. See Event Log for details.

data.name: CATALOGIMPORT_IMPORTINPROGRESS
data.value: Import operation is in progress. Wait for it to finish.

data.name: CATALOGIMPORT_IMPORT_COMPLETED_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Attention! Results of the import operation will be written to the Log.

data.name: CATEGORIES_UP
data.value: Move selected tab up in list

data.name: CATEGORIES_DOWN
data.value: Move selected tab down in list

data.name: CATEGORIES_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Error deleting: category contains products, other categories or pages assocaited with it. Remove them first in order to delete this category.

data.name: CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_WARNING
data.value: You must create at least one Attribute Class for category before adding new category.

data.name: CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_CLASSES_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Attribute classes allow you to specify additional attributes for the Category like short description, images. You will need to create a new class or select the existing. After saving the Category you will see the attributes (if any) available for entry.

data.name: CATEGORY_DISCOUNT_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Selected discount will be applied to all products that belong to this or any other sub category.

data.name: CATEGORY_TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Pick a template that will be used to display this category. The template usually can only handle specific attribute class. Make sure they match.

data.name: CATEGORY_LINK_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Enter a link if you want category to simply be a link to the other page.

data.name: CATEGORYHOME_FORM_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Use this form to create and manage the hierarchy of categories that will help you organize your products. You can:

data.name: CATEGORYHOME_ITEM_ADD_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION
data.value: to add a new category select the category to which a new category will be subordinate, and then click add category button. Fill in the information and then click save button.

data.name: CATEGORYHOME_ITEM_EDIT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION
data.value: to edit a category, select the category and then click Edit Category button. Fill in the information you want and click save.

data.name: CATEGORYHOME_ITEM_DELETE_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION
data.value: to delete a category, select the category and then click Edit Category button. Click delete button in the category form.

data.name: CATEGORYHOME_ITEM_ADD_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION
data.value: to add a new product select the category to which a new product will be subordinate, and then click new product button. Fill in the information and then click save button.

data.name: CATEGORYHOME_ITEM_ADD_VIRTUAL_PAGE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: to add a new virtual page select the category to which a new virtual page will be subordinate, and then click new virtual page button. Fill in the information and then click save button.

data.name: CATEGORYHOME_MOVE_UP
data.value: Move selected category up in list

data.name: CATEGORYHOME_MOVE_DOWN
data.value: Move selected category down in list

data.name: COUNTRIES_DELETECOUNTRY_ERROR
data.value: Cannot delete country, probably it has data associated with it (e.g. regions may be used in taxes, etc.). See log for details.

data.name: COUPON_REQUIREMENT_CUSTOMER_ASSIGNED
data.value: Discount must be assigned to customer

data.name: COUPON_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASE_ALL
data.value: Must purchase all of these SKUs

data.name: COUPON_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASE_ONE
data.value: Must purchase one of these SKUs

data.name: COUPON_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASED_ALL_WITHIN_NDAYS
data.value: Had purchased all of these SKUs within n days

data.name: COUPON_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASED_ONE_WITHIN_NDAYS
data.value: Had purchased one of these SKUs within n days

data.name: COUPON_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASED_ALL_AFTER_DATE
data.value: Had purchased all of these SKUs on or after x

data.name: COUPON_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASED_ONE_AFTER_DATE
data.value: Had purchased one of these SKUs on or after x

data.name: COUPON_DISCOUNT_BASED_ONE_OF_THESE_SKUS
data.value: One of these SKUs (the most expensive purchased)

data.name: COUPON_QTY_DISCOUNT_DESCRIPTION
data.value: To activate Quantity Discounts enter 2 or more. If you enter 10, this discount will be applied to items when 10 or more (or until the other quantity discount found) are placed in the shopping cart.

data.name: COUPONRESTRICTION_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASE_ALL
data.value: Must purchase all of these SKUs

data.name: COUPONRESTRICTION_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASE_ONE
data.value: Must purchase one of these SKUs

data.name: COUPONRESTRICTION_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASED_ALL_WITHIN_NDAYS
data.value: Had purchased all of these SKUs within n days

data.name: COUPONRESTRICTION_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASED_ONE_WITHIN_NDAYS
data.value: Had purchased one of these SKUs within n days

data.name: COUPONRESTRICTION_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASED_ALL_AFTER_DATE
data.value: Had purchased all of these SKUs on or after x

data.name: COUPONRESTRICTION_REQUIREMENT_PURCHASED_ONE_AFTER_DATE
data.value: Had purchased one of these SKUs on or after x

data.name: COUPONRESTRICTION_QTY_DISCOUNT_DESCRIPTION
data.value: To activate Quantity Discounts enter 2 or more. If you enter 10, this discount will be applied to items when 10 or more (or until the other quantity discount found) are placed in the shopping cart.

data.name: COUPONRESTRICTIONSKUS_WARNING
data.value: (you will be able to assign sku's right after the item is created)

data.name: COUPONRESTRICTIONSKUS_SELECT_SKUS
data.value: Select SKU's the Discount Coupon should be assigned to.

data.name: COUPONSKUS_SELECT_SKUS
data.value: Select SKU's the Discount Coupon should be assigned to.

data.name: COUPONSKUS_WARNING
data.value: (you will be able to assign sku's right after the item is created)

data.name: CURRENCIES_DELETE_ERROR
data.value: Error: you must delete all data related to the currency you're trying to delete (for example, rate etc.).

data.name: CURRENCIES_ADDCURRENCY_ERROR
data.value: Cannot add a currency. See log for details.

data.name: CURRENCYEDIT_SELECT
data.value: Select Currencies used in the store.

data.name: CURRENCYEDIT_DEFINE_RATES
data.value: Define currency rates (automatic update engine is available for some).

data.name: CUSTOMER_EMAIL_INVALID
data.value: Must use a valid email address.

data.name: CUSTOMERROLEHOME_ERROR_EMPTY_ROLE
data.value: Role name must not be empty

data.name: GATEWAY_ERROR_EMPTY_SYSTEM_NAME
data.value: 'System Name' must not be left blank.

data.name: GATEWAY_CREATE_PAYMENT_PLAN
data.value: Create payment plan for recurring orders

data.name: GATEWAY_RECURRING_BILLLING_DESCRIPTION
data.value: You can setup how this payment method will behave when it encounters the recurring order. If you select to create payment plan then the system will create a recurring task that will call the class specified on regular basis. Some gateway providers support recurring payments and thus no plan is necessary.

data.name: IMPORT_MAIN_TEXT_EDITING
data.value: Select mapping file for editing rules

data.name: IMPORT_MAIN_HEADER_OPERATIONS
data.value: Create mapping files and import data

data.name: IMPORT_MAIN_NAME_MAPPING_OPERATION
data.value: Create Mapping file from data file

data.name: IMPORT_MAIN_NAME_IMPORTING_OPERATION
data.value: Importing data using mapping file and data file

data.name: IMPORT_MAPPING_STEP1
data.value: Step 1. Select data file and intended import type

data.name: IMPORT_MAPPING_STEP2
data.value: Step 2. Generate fields and attributes from import types to map to columns in data file

data.name: IMPORT_MAPPING_TITLE_COLUMN_HEADERS
data.value: Column headers in the data file

data.name: IMPORT_MAPPING_ENTER_FILENAME
data.value: Enter to mapping file name to generate

data.name: IMPORT_PROCESS_TITLE
data.value: Choose the data file and mapping file to use

data.name: IMPORT_MSG_RESULT
data.value: It has been successfully processed {0} rows from {1}.

data.name: IMPORT_MSG_ERRORS
data.value: The following errors occured while importing:

data.name: IMPORT_MSG_ERROR_DATATYPE_NOT_DEFINED
data.value: Error, Data Types are not defined for import

data.name: LANGUAGEEDIT_ERROR_EMPTY_ISO_CODE
data.value: 'ISO Code' must not be left blank.

data.name: LICENSEAGREEMENTS_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Can't delete license because there are SKU's that use it.

data.name: LOGINMODULE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Fully integrated commerce tools for creating catalogs, managing products, taking orders, processing financial transactions, fulfilling orders, and measuring success.

data.name: LOGINMODULE_IE60_REQUIRED
data.value: PS: IE6.0 or higher version is required to use Commerce Management Tools.

data.name: LOGINMODULE_LOGIN_FAILED
data.value: Your login attempt was not successful. Please try again.

data.name: MASTERTEMPLATE_INSTALL_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Installs the current template if it has not been installed yet. Only the features selected from the components will be setup. (Note: some implementation might not work correctly unless all the features installed)

data.name: MASTERTEMPLATE_REINSTALL_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Reinstalls the features selected in components list. It will only create components that has not been installed.

data.name: MASTERTEMPLATE_UNINSTALL_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Removes all the features of this Master template.

data.name: MASTERTEMPLATE_COMPONENTS_ATTRIBUTES_DESCRIPTION
data.value: defines custom attribute classes and fields

data.name: MASTERTEMPLATE_COMPONENTS_LEGEND_TEMPLATES_DESCRIPTION
data.value: designs used to present categories, products and sku, won't be removed on uninstall if any one is associated with a corresponding item

data.name: MASTERTEMPLATE_NOTE
data.value: Note that some master templates will offer only subset of this features

data.name: MESSAGEQUEUE_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Cannot delete item from the message queue. See Log for details.

data.name: MESSAGEQUEUEEDIT_RETURN_TO_LIST
data.value: Return to list of messages in the queue

data.name: MESSAGEQUEUEEDIT_ERROR_INVALID_ID
data.value: Message with requested id doesn't exist.

data.name: NEWS_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Cannot delete the news. See Log for details.

data.name: NEWSCATEGORIES_ERROR_DELETE_LOG
data.value: Failed to delete the news category

data.name: NEWSCATEGORIES_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Cannot delete the news category. See Log for details.

data.name: NEWSCATEGORYEDIT_RETURN_TO_LIST
data.value: Return to the list of news categories

data.name: OBJECTCATEGORYEDIT_ASSIGN_WARNING
data.value: (you will be able to assign categories right after the item is created)

data.name: OBJECTDOWNLOAD_ASSIGN_WARNING
data.value: (you will be able to assign downloads right after the item is created)

data.name: OBJECTDOWNLOAD_NEED_PACKAGES
data.value: You need to create download packages before you will be able to assign them

data.name: OBJECTDOWNLOAD_CLICK_TO_CREATE_DOWNLOAD
data.value: Click here to create new download

data.name: OBJECTDOWNLOADEDIT_SET_NAME_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Set name is the name for the whole collection of different file versions.

data.name: OBJECTDOWNLOADEDIT_RELEASE_DATE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Release date will be used to determine who can download this release. It will be available to those customers who bought current license within a month or own a subscription license which period is not expired before the release date.

data.name: OBJECTDOWNLOADEDIT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Type determines to whom the download is available to. Release is available based on type of license bought and time it is bought. Beta is only available to active subscription based licenses. Trial is available to any registered user.

data.name: OBJECTDOWNLOADEDIT_URL_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Please specify either url from where file can be downloaded or upload a new file to the server. If you do both, File URL will be auto populated by the url to the uploaded file. Direct link will be never available to the customer.

data.name: ORDER_ERROR_USE_PAYMENT_PLAN
data.value: The payment plans were automatically created for the order.

data.name: ORDER_ERROR_USE_PAYMENT_PLAN_NO
data.value: The payment plans were not automatically created for the order. Please create the necessary ones manually.

data.name: ORDER_ERROR_USE_PAYMENT_PLAN2
data.value: The payment plans were NOT deleted for this order and will be processed. You will have to manually delete them through payment plans interface.

data.name: ORDER_ERROR_USE_PAYMENT_PLAN_NO2
data.value: The order has recurring payments associated with it. Please check your payment gateway administration for any. They were NOT deleted or cancelled.

data.name: ORDER_DESCRIPTION_COMPLETE_ORDER1
data.value: will mark the order as processed, adjust inventory, create payment plans

data.name: ORDER_DESCRIPTION_CANCEL_ORDER1
data.value: will mark order as unprocessed, adjust inventory but won't delete previously created payment plans

data.name: ORDER_DESCRIPTION_DELIVERY_STATUS
data.value: Delivery status is based on number of packages shipped, if no shipping required the status will be fulfilled

data.name: ORDER_DESCRIPTION_OVERALL_ORDER_STATUS
data.value: Overall Order status, it will be set manually and should be used to track status of the order

data.name: ORDERS_PERFORM_BATCH
data.value: Perform batch order processing on selected orders

data.name: ORDERSTATUSES_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Can't delete order status due to existing orders that use it.

data.name: ORDERSSEARCH_PERFORM_BATCH
data.value: Perform batch order processing on selected orders

data.name: ORDERSTATUSEDIT_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Can't delete order status due to existing orders that use it.

data.name: PAGEEDIT_ATTRIBUTES_WARNING
data.value: You must create at least one Attribute Class for Virtual Page before adding a new Page.

data.name: PAGEEDIT_CLASSES_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Attribute classes allow you to specify additional attributes for the Virtual Page like description, images. You will need to create a new class or select the existing. After saving the Virtual Page you will see the attributes (if any) available for entry.

data.name: PAGEEDIT_TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Pick a template that will be used to display this Virtual Page. The template usually can only handle specific attribute class. Make sure they match.

data.name: PAGEEDIT_ROLES_ACCESS
data.value: Roles required to access the page (if none selected, anonymous user will be able to access the page)

data.name: PAGEEDIT_ERROR_PATH_EXISTS
data.value: New page will not be created because page with the specified path already exists.

data.name: PAYMENTPLAN_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Create or modify the payment plan. If plan is active it will be picked up by the recurring payment service. The payment service needs to be enable as well. The errors if any, will be reported in general error log and via email.

data.name: PAYMENTPLAN_EMAIL_INVALID
data.value: Must use a valid email address.

data.name: PAYMENTPLAN_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Enter amount in base currency. It will be converted to local customer currency automatically if rate is specified.

data.name: PAYMENTPLAN_METHOD_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Select the payment method that will be used to process this plan. The payment provider will be responsible for processing the transaction and notifying about success or failure.

data.name: POLL_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Cannot delete the poll. See Log for details.

data.name: PRODUCTACCESSORY_PRODUCT_NOT_CREATED
data.value: Product is not created, so no accessories can be associted.

data.name: PRODUCTCROSSSELLING_PRODUCT_NOT_CREATED
data.value: Product is not created, so no cross-selling products can be assigned.

data.name: PRODUCTOVERVIEW_ATTRIBUTES_WARNING
data.value: You must create at least one Attribute Class for product before adding new product.

data.name: PRODUCTOVERVIEW_CODE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Each product must have a unique Code which can be useful in importing/exporting.

data.name: PRODUCTOVERVIEW_CLASSES_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Attribute classes allow you to specify additional attributes for the Product like description, images. You will need to create a new class or select the existing. After saving the Product you will see the attributes (if any) available for entry.

data.name: PRODUCTOVERVIEW_TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Pick a template that will be used to display this product. The template usually can only handle specific attribute class. Make sure they match.

data.name: PRODUCTSKUS_PRODUCT_NOT_CREATED
data.value: Product is not created, so no sku's can be assigned

data.name: REGIONS_DELETE_ERROR
data.value: Cannot delete region: it has some data associated with it (taxes etc.)

data.name: SERIALNUMBERSET_SN_WILL_BE_ISSUED
data.value: Serial Numbers will be issued from a list that you provide.

data.name: SERIALNUMBERSET_RETURN_TO_LIST
data.value: return to serial number sets list

data.name: SERIALNUMBERSETS_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Can't delete license because there are SKU's that use it.

data.name: SERVICE_ERROR_EMPTY_TIME_LAPSE
data.value: 'Time Lapse' must not be left blank.

data.name: SERVICE_ERROR_INVALID_TIME_LAPSE
data.value: 'Time Lapse' must be a valid integer number.

data.name: SERVICE_ERROR_EMPTY_RETRY_TIME_LAPSE
data.value: 'Retry Time Lapse' must not be left blank.

data.name: SERVICE_ERROR_INVALID_RETRY_TIME_LAPSE
data.value: 'Retry Time Lapse' must be a valid integer number.

data.name: SERVICE_ERROR_EMPTY_RETAIN_SCHEDULE_HISTORY
data.value: 'Retain Schedule History' must not be left blank.

data.name: SERVICE_ERROR_INVALID_RETAIN_SCHEDULE_HISTORY
data.value: 'Retain Schedule History' must be a valid integer number.

data.name: SERVICE_RETAIN_HISTORY_EXAMPLE
data.value: Example: Enter "10" to keep the ten most recent schedule history rows.

data.name: SERVICE_RETAIN_HISTORY_EXAMPLE_MINUS_1
data.value: Enter "-1" to keep all history rows.

data.name: SETTINGS_STORE_NAME_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Store name and email will be used throughout the public site.

data.name: SETTINGS_SITE_URL_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Url for the public site. (example: http://store.mycompany.com)

data.name: SETTINGS_SITE_PHYSICAL_PATH_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Physical path to folder where the public site is installed. (example: C:\Program Files\Mediachase\.NET eCommerce Framework 2005\eCFEverythingStore)

data.name: SETTINGS_FULLTEXT_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION
data.value: eCF Full Text Search provides advanced and fast search capabilities. You will need to have Full Text Search SQL Server component installed.

data.name: SETTINGS_IMAGES_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Turn on storing images in database feature. If not enabled images will be stored in file system.

data.name: SETTINGS_HTML_MODE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Defines if html designer will be used to edit descriptions.

data.name: SETTINGS_REQUIRE_EMAIL_VALIDATION_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Select if email validation is required. The user account will be disabled until the email is validated.

data.name: SETTINGS_BASE_CURRENCY_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Select currency the sku's price is in. It will be used as a base for currency convertion.

data.name: SETTINGS_FREE_UPGRADES_PERIOD_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Define how many months free upgrades are available to the customers.

data.name: SETTINGS_SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Define how many months is subscription period (customers will be able to download free upgrades).

data.name: SETTINGS_SECURE_URL_LINK_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Define secure url used for login and checkout. Should be of form https://yourserver.com. If not set, current server will be used.

data.name: SETTINGS_BASE_WEIGHT_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Select the weight that will be used as a default.

data.name: SETTINGS_REPORTING_SERVER_URL_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Reporting Server provides functionality to create custom reporting using Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Server. You will need to have reporting server installed and configured prior to using this functionality. You can get more information about reporting server at

data.name: SETTINGS_CC_KEEP_DESCRIPTION
data.value: If set to yes, credit card information will be retained in the database, otherwise it will be removed as soon as order is completed.

data.name: SETTINGS_STORE_CLOSED_DESCRIPTION
data.value: When closed the message will be displayed to the user.

data.name: SETTINGS_WEB_SERVICES_DESCRIPTION
data.value: The url of the site where web services is located. For example: http://store.yourcompany.com/webservices/

data.name: SHIPPING_ERROR_EMPTY_SYSTEM_NAME
data.value: 'System Name' must not be left blank.

data.name: SHIPPINGMETHODEDIT_ERROR_EMPTY_FRIENDLY_NAME
data.value: 'Friendly Name' must not be left blank.

data.name: SHIPPINGMETHODEDIT_ERROR_CANNOT_SAVE
data.value: Shipping method cannot be saved. Probably Name is not unique.

data.name: SITESTRUCTUREHOME_FORM_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Use this form to manage your site structure. The structure is similar to file system, where folders are categories which can contain other categories, products or virtual pages.

data.name: SITESTRUCTUREHOME_EXPORT_CONFIRM
data.value: Exporting to xml can take a long time and take system resources, thus slowing down the server. Do you want to continue?

data.name: SKU_ATTRIBUTE_CLASS_WARNING
data.value: You must create at least one Attribute Class for Sku before adding new Sku.

data.name: SKU_NAME_DESCRIPTION
data.value: The full name of your sku as your customer will see it in shopping cart and product details page. The name should uniquely identify the sku. If sku comes in black color and small size name it "Black (small)".

data.name: SKU_CLASSES_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Attribute classes allow you to specify additional attributes for the sku's like size and color. You will need to create a new class or select the existing one. After saving the SKU you will see the attributes (if any) available for entry.

data.name: SKU_CODE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Each Product must have a unique SKU. SKU can be used for integration with other software products.

data.name: SKU_PRICE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Enter price in base currency. It will be converted to local customer currency automatically if rate is specified.

data.name: SKU_SHIPPING_PACKAGE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Select a package that will be used for shipping. Each package depends on shipping provider used and specified in Package table. You can add new package types. Consult documentation for futher instructions.

data.name: SKU_REGULAR_BILLING_CYCLE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: You can setup a billing cycle for the sku. The customer will be billed the amount of sku price regulary. The payment plan will be automatically created upon order completion.

data.name: SKU_SOFTWARE_SPECIFIC_PARAMETERS_DESCRIPTION
data.value: The following attributes can be used for software type or similar products that require license agreements, use downloadable media or create serial numbers.

data.name: TAXESCONFIGURE_CREATE_CATEGORIES
data.value: Create Categories and define regional tax amounts for each tax in the category.

data.name: TAXESEDIT_DESCRIPTION1
data.value: Please configure different taxes (State Tax and so on) and tax categories (will be assigned to the skus) using the following link

data.name: TAXESEDIT_DESCRIPTION2
data.value: Once the taxes are configured, create a jurisdictions for which you will be charging taxes and then assign tax values for them using grid below.

data.name: TAXREGIONS_ZIP_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Leave blank to include all zip/postal codes

data.name: TEMPLATE_USE_VARIABLES
data.value: Use this variables in the message template.

data.name: USER_ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL
data.value: Must use a valid email address.

data.name: USER_ERROR_DELETE_SELF
data.value: You cannot delete your own account.

data.name: WAREHOUSEEDIT_ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL
data.value: Must use a valid email address.

data.name: IMPORTPAGE_IMPORT_END
data.value: This is the end of import

data.name: IMPORTPAGE_CLIENT_DONT_NAVIGATE
data.value: Please do not close this webpage or navigate away from it until the process is finished.

data.name: EMAILCONTROL_ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL
data.value: Must use a valid email address.

data.name: UPLOAD_CLOSE_WHEN_COMPLETES
data.value: Close this box when upload completes

data.name: SECURITY_INHERIT
data.value: Inherit from parent the permission entries that apply to child objects

data.name: STAT_EVENTS_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Error deleting: the event contains items assocaited with it.

data.name: STAT_EVENTCATEGORIES_ERROR_DELETE
data.value: Error deleting: the category contains events assocaited with it.

data.name: STAT_EVENTCATEGORIES_ERROR_ADD
data.value: The category with such name already exists. Try to use another name.

data.name: STAT_EVENTS_ERROR_ADD
data.value: The Event Identifier with such name already exists. Try to use another name.

data.name: STATSOVERVIEW_DISTRIBUTION_OF_VISITORS_BY_TIME
data.value: Distribution of visitors by time of the day

data.name: STATSOVERVIEW_DISTRIBUTION_OF_VISITORS_BY_DAY
data.value: Distribution of visitors by day of the week

data.name: CATEGORY_EMPTY_WARNING
data.value: No category selected. Please click on category name from the list first.

data.name: OBJECT_EMPTY_WARNING
data.value: No object selected. Please check the box of the item you want to modify.

data.name: OBJECT_PICK_ONE_WARNING
data.value: Multiple objects selected. Operation requres only one object, please unchek others.

data.name: PAGEORPRODUCT_COPYMOVE_ROOT_WARNING
data.value: Can't copy/move product/page to root, must be assigned to category.

data.name: OUTOFSTOCK_WARNING
data.value: Some Product SKUs appear to be out of stock. Click this link to view the details.

data.name: RSS_ERROR
data.value: There was a problem retrieving the news.

data.name: DeleteSelectedItemsConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete selected items?

data.name: UnlockSelectedAccountsConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to unlock selected accounts?

data.name: DeleteRolesConfirmation
data.value: Deleting a role in the system may have an effect on business logic. Are you sure you want to delete this role?

data.name: LICENSE_DELETE_WARNING
data.value: WARNING! Deleting this license key will disable the site. Are you sure you want to do this?
